content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was commanded to google "advanced materials for interstellar travel" and my computer returned a list of links, including articles on the benefits of space exploration, using nuclear materials for space travel, optimizing space travel efficiency, new materials built to withstand extreme conditions, new space materials for Mars, interstellar travel, and a material called GRx-810.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "advanced propulsion systems for interstellar travel"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interstellar_travel", "https://www.wired.com/story/travelers-guide-to-the-stars-interstellar-travel/", "https://www.popularmechanics.com/space/deep-space/a42467338/propulsion-system-interstellar-travel-earth-neptune/", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2214552420300407", "https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32718676/", "https://mkaku.org/home/articles/the-physics-of-interstellar-travel/", "https://www.amazon.com/Advanced-Propulsion-Systems-Martin-Tajmar/dp/3211838627", "https://www.space.com/antimatter-propulsion-visiting-exoplanets"]', type='action_result')]
"""
